languages.text: {n}Губернатор с любопытством смотрит на Паскаля.{/n} "По имеющимся донесениям, логис Авель Ханейманн направился в Благословенную Электродинамическую Обитель незадолго до штурма. Я рад узнать, что вы в безопасности. Возможно, вы владеете информацией о господине ван Калоксе?"

{n}The governor looks at Pasqal with curiosity.{/n} "According to the reports we've received, Logis Abel Haneumann set off for the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium a short while before it was stormed. I'm glad to find out that you're safe. Perhaps you possess information on Master van Calox?"
languages.original_text: {n}Губернатор с любопытством смотрит на Паскаля.{/n} "По имеющимся донесениям, логис Авель Ханейманн направился в Благословенную Электродинамическую Обитель незадолго до штурма. Я рад узнать, что вы в безопасности. Возможно, вы владеете информацией о господине ван Калоксе?"

{n}The governor looks at Pasqal with curiosity.{/n} "According to the reports we have, Logis Abel Haneumann set off for the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium a short while before it was stormed. I'm glad to find out you're safe. Perhaps you have information on Mr van Calox?"

{n}The governor looks at Pasqal with curiosity.{/n} "According to the reports we've received, Logis Abel Haneumann had set off for the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium a short while before it was stormed. I'm glad to find out that you're safe. Perhaps you possess information on Lord van Calox?"

{n}The governor looks at Pasqal with curiosity.{/n} "According to the reports we've received, Logis Abel Haneumann had set off for the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium a short while before it was stormed. I'm glad to find out that you're safe. Perhaps you possess information on Lord van Calox?"

{n}The governor looks at Pasqal with curiosity.{/n} "According to the reports we've received, Logis Abel Haneumann set off for the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium a short while before it was stormed. I'm glad to find out that you're safe. Perhaps you possess information on Master van Calox?"

{n}The governor looks at Pasqal with curiosity.{/n} "According to the reports we've received, Logis Abel Haneumann set off for the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium a short while before it was stormed. I'm glad to find out that you're safe. Perhaps you possess information on Master van Calox?"

languages.text: {n}Der Gouverneur blickt Pasqal neugierig an.{/n} "Unseren Berichten zufolge war Logis Abel Haneumann zum Heiligen Elektrodynamischen Cenobium aufgebrochen, kurz bevor es gestürmt wurde. Es freut mich, dass Ihr wohlauf seid. Vielleicht besitzt Ihr Informationen über Meister van Calox?"
languages.original_text: {n}The governor looks at Pasqal with curiosity.{/n} "According to the reports we've received, Logis Abel Haneumann set off for the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium a short while before it was stormed. I'm glad to find out that you're safe. Perhaps you possess information on Master van Calox?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Gouverneur blickt Pasqal neugierig an.{/n} "Unseren Berichten zufolge war Logis Abel Haneumann zum Heiligen Elektrodynamischen Cenobium aufgebrochen, kurz bevor es gestürmt wurde. Es freut mich, dass Ihr wohlauf seid. Vielleicht besitzt Ihr Informationen über Lord van Calox?"

languages.text: {n}Le gouverneur regarde Pasqal avec curiosité et dit :{/n} « D'après les rapports que nous avons reçus, le logis Abel Haneumann était parti pour le Cenobium électrodynamique sacré peu avant qu'il ne soit pris d'assaut. Je suis heureux de vous savoir sain et sauf. Auriez-vous des informations concernant maître van Calox, par hasard ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The governor looks at Pasqal with curiosity.{/n} "According to the reports we've received, Logis Abel Haneumann set off for the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium a short while before it was stormed. I'm glad to find out that you're safe. Perhaps you possess information on Master van Calox?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le gouverneur regarde Pasqal avec curiosité et dit :{/n} « D'après les rapports que nous avons reçus, le logis Abel Haneumann était parti pour le Cenobium électrodynamique sacré peu avant qu'il ne soit pris d'assaut. Je suis heureux de vous savoir sain et sauf. Auriez-vous des informations concernant maître van Calox, par hasard ? »

languages.text: {n}总督好奇地看着帕斯卡。{/n}“根据我们收到的报告，逻辑士亚伯·哈努曼出发前往神圣电驱修会不久，那里就遭到了袭击。我很高兴看到你平安无事，或许你了解到了冯·卡洛克斯大师的消息？”
languages.original_text: {n}The governor looks at Pasqal with curiosity.{/n} "According to the reports we've received, Logis Abel Haneumann set off for the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium a short while before it was stormed. I'm glad to find out that you're safe. Perhaps you possess information on Master van Calox?"

traits.locale_text: {n}总督好奇地看着帕斯卡。{/n}“根据我们收到的报告，逻辑士亚伯·哈努曼出发前往神圣电驱力修会不久，那里就遭到了袭击。我很高兴看到你平安无事，或许你了解到了冯·卡洛克斯大人的消息？”

languages.text: {n}総督は興味深そうにパスカルを見る。{/n}「私たちが受け取った報告によると、論理学者アベル・ヘニュマンは、神聖なる電力連生体が襲撃される少し前に出発したとのこと。君達がご無事で何よりだ。もしや、ヴァン・カロックス卿に関する情報をお持ちなのでは？」
languages.original_text: {n}The governor looks at Pasqal with curiosity.{/n} "According to the reports we've received, Logis Abel Haneumann set off for the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium a short while before it was stormed. I'm glad to find out that you're safe. Perhaps you possess information on Master van Calox?"

traits.locale_text: {n}総督は興味深そうにパスカルを見る。{/n}「私たちが受け取った報告によると、論理学者アベル・ヘニュマンは、神聖なる電力連生体が襲撃される少し前に出発したとのこと。君達がご無事で何よりだ。もしや、ヴァン・カロックス卿に関する情報をお持ちなのでは？」

languages.text: {n}El gobernador mira a Pasqal con curiosidad.{/n} «Según los informes que hemos recibido, el Logos Abel Haneumann había partido hacia el Cenobio Electrodinámico Sagrado poco antes de que fuera asaltado. Me alegra saber que está a salvo. ¿Quizá posea información sobre el maestro van Calox?».
languages.original_text: {n}The governor looks at Pasqal with curiosity.{/n} "According to the reports we've received, Logis Abel Haneumann set off for the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium a short while before it was stormed. I'm glad to find out that you're safe. Perhaps you possess information on Master van Calox?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El gobernador mira a Pasqal con curiosidad.{/n} «Según los informes que hemos recibido, el Logos Abel Haneumann había partido hacia el Cenobio Electrodinámico Sagrado poco antes de que fuera asaltado. Me alegra saber que está a salvo. ¿Quizá posea información sobre lord van Calox?».

languages.text: {n}Vali, merakla Pasqal'a bakıyor.{/n} "Aldığımız raporlara göre Logis Abel Haneumann, Mukaddes Elektrodinamik Senobiyumu saldırıya uğramadan hemen önce oraya doğru yola çıkmıştı. Güvende olduğunuzu öğrendiğime sevindim. Acaba Üstat van Calox hakkında bilginiz var mıdır?"
languages.original_text: {n}The governor looks at Pasqal with curiosity.{/n} "According to the reports we've received, Logis Abel Haneumann set off for the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium a short while before it was stormed. I'm glad to find out that you're safe. Perhaps you possess information on Master van Calox?"
